document.full_text: an in-school drug and alcohol abuse clinic is opening at a public high school on long island, the first of its kind in new york state and possibly in the nation, treatment advocates said on wednesday.
document.title: public high school opens precedent-setting drug clinic
lines_and_colors: an in-school drug and alcohol abuse clinic is opening at a public high school on long island, the first of its kind in new york state and possibly in the nation, treatment advocates said on wednesday.
